subject: [Radiance-general] FalseColor
body:
Hi Kyle,

Thanks to Thomas Bleicher, you can also use falsecolor2 and wxfalsecolor as
an alternative:
https://sites.google.com/site/tbleicher/radiance/wxfalsecolor

Regards,
Mostapha
